fave1.name: watch movies
fave1.quote: Movies can and do have tremendous influence in shaping young lives in the realm of entertainment towards the ideals and objectives of normal adulthood. - Walt Disney
fave1.desc: Movie nights bring together families, friends, and couples. They make us laugh and connect us, while weâ€™re having time together. Now during Coronavirus, we all miss going to the cinema with our friends, or on a date.

fave2.name: making food
fave2.quote: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world, people get together to eat. - Guy Fieri
fave2.desc: Preparing food at home can be especially beneficial for people who has a food allergy. Eating homemade foods is usually much cheaper than eating at a restaurant or buying processed foods from the market.

fave3.name: travel
fave3.quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page. - Saint Augustine
fave3.desc: Travel Relieves Stress, although missing a connecting flight or losing baggage in a foreign airport is sure to boost your anxiety, traveling has been scientifically proven to lower stress levels, and rather dramatically.
